Name: Hover Ship
About the game: Hover Ship is an arcade game in which you have to control a floating ship on an obstacle course, collect coins and set new records. The pace of the game accelerates as the distance traveled, you should be careful, because the road is littered with many unexpected traps. The accumulated coins can be spent on new ship models that will not give you an advantage, but look cool.

Meta Description: Looking for information on Hover Ship? Check out the release date (Dec 31, 2020), developer insights from INFINITE BRIDGE, and a complete game summary.
